node.display_long_description:
A portal to new worlds, a virtual home filled with endless experiences to discover and explore, a place to connect with loved ones. World travel, casual games, media customization,  adventure, and relaxation.

- Invite your friends and family, and travel together to new places to see the world - hundreds of virtual travels to all continents: take a city tour, a hot air balloon ride, a back-country road trip
- Explore the depth of the ocean - go diving in the Great Barrier Reef of Australia, or swim with dolphins in the Pacific Ocean
- Relax and practice meditation in nature - guided, or unguided
- Listen to classical music
- Play with your virtual pet
- Play games, share photos, upload and watch your own videos - standard, and 360, and step into them together.

Alcove has something for everyone, no matter your age. Download Alcove and start exploring today!

Note: Alcove will keep growing with new immersive experiences and features. Please let us know what you’d love to see next.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
1.129
- New experience: Jigsaw 360 - Multiplayer coming soon!
- New videos from Malta in the travel globe!
- Fixed issue where multiple avatars would overlap when teleporting
- Fixed issue where avatar profile icons would load incorrectly

1.126
- SpeedSort moved from interactive table to Brain Games DLC
- You can continue to play for free with the preview option!

- Fixed issue with SpeedSort not launching correctly
- Fixed String Recall locking up in certain situations

1.123
- Fixed issue with Globe pointing to the wrong version of Wander
- Fixed issue with quick menu when using Quest 1
- Fixed issue with Quest 2 pointers

1.121
- Fixed back button not working on Quest 2
- Added all Virtuleap games to the cube in the health area

1.120
- New experience from Virtuleap, Magic Deck!
- Two new visitation videos from David Lobser!
- Fixed case where users were unable to interact in the Travel area
- Fixed chess promotion not updating visuals
- Adjusted volume and sound for high score in Staying Sharp DLC
- Fixed case where you could follow a user while leading them

1.115
- Over 20 new brain games added to the Staying Sharp bundle!
- Fix for an issue that could cause avatars to appear as only hands without a body 
- Voice communication is now maintained while users are in single player games

1.111
- Hotfix for missing Brain Games content.

1.110
- Happy holidays from Alcove!
- Festive decor has been added to the living room
- New holiday music videos have been added to the violin
- Previous Staying Sharp games have returned to the interactive table
- Performance and memory improvements

1.108
New Premium Content:
- Into Space by Faber Courtial -- Take off into space with 2 gravity-defying expeditions, 14 and 11 minutes each. These award-winning short VR films from Faber Courtial took the world by storm at Cannes XR, Venice Film Festival, Tribeca and many more, by conveying how it must feel to actually be out in the open cosmos. Visit unknown worlds of extraordinary richness, detail and authenticity - perfectly reconstructed in 3D from original NASA and ESA data. 
- AARP Staying Sharp Games --Test your recall, focus, word skills and more with this variety fun-pack of 22 short, 1-minute games! Track your progress and master 3 levels of difficulty in the categories of Logic, Language, Visual, Speed, Focus and Memory, recreated from AARP’s popular Staying Sharp digital program (https://stayingsharp.aarp.org/about/brain-health/games-play/). Season one includes Visual Sudoku, Mahjong Match, Grow Words, Math Bubbles, Pipe Dreams, Secret Symbols, and many more favorites from AARP’s premium content. Have you played the original version? Which one do you like more? 

New Feature:
- Photo rotation - we've added the ability to rotate photos. Click on each photo to bring up the options.

node.display_short_description: Take off into space with 2 gravity-defying expeditions, 14 and 11 minutes each. These award-winning short VR films from Faber Courtial took the world by storm at Cannes XR, Venice Film Festival, Tribeca and many more, by conveying how it must feel to actually be out in the open cosmos. Visit unknown worlds of extraordinary richness, detail and authenticity - perfectly reconstructed in 3D from original NASA and ESA data.

purchase_alerts.message: 这是附加内容，需要有主游戏 (Alcove) 才能玩

nodes.title: Refresh your perspective with two NEW meditations from David Lobser
nodes.body_text:
Immerse yourself in a relaxing world of colors, sounds and shapes in the latest from David Lobser's Visitation series: Butterflies and Crystals. Experience tranquility and calm in a transformative landscape where you can leave the real world behind. No rocket required.

We value and appreciate the time you spend in Alcove and want you to enjoy all it has to offer. Please let us know how you like our meditation experiences and if there's anything more you'd like to see in a future Alcove release.

We're always available to answer your questions and listen to feedback at feedback@alcovevr.com. Thanks for your support!

nodes.title: Visit Paris for Valentine's Day!
nodes.body_text:
Paris is your romantic getaway without a passport or plane ticket this Valentine's Day in Alcove! Catch views of The City of Light from the top of the Eiffel Tower, Notre-Dame Cathedral, Sacré-Cœur Basilica, The Louvre, and much more!

Explore all the top attractions with up to three friends or on your own.

We hope you enjoy Alcove’s variety of guided and non-guided city tours, let us know what other destinations you’d like to visit on a future Alcove release.

We're always available to answer your questions and listen to feedback at feedback@alcovevr.com. Thanks for your support!

Happy Valentine’s Day from Team Alcove

node.reviewDescription: I really enjoy this app and can't beat that it's free. I do agree with others though that there could be more scenes. The ocean and mountain scenes are really nice. The meadow is pretty boring. It would be nice if we could hear the ocean more or hear wind blowing through the mountains. Adding the noise of the fire crackling and popping would also be nice. Being able to listen to soft music outside while enjoying the view would be good. The ability to add rain or a thunder storm to the meadow would make it more relaxing/interesting to me.  More content to the tv or the ability to sync with Netflix or prime would be great! Adding different living environments would also be nice but I know I'm getting carried away.  Also it is the end of January and time to take down the Christmas tree I think. Overall and great app with some really nice features.
node.reviewTitle: Great app that could be amazing!

developerResponse.body: Hi FirePhoenix28 thanks for taking the time to provide us with this valuable feedback! We appreciate the time you spend in Alcove and these suggestions really help us zero in on how we can improve the experience. Yes, while the spirit of the holiday remains, the decorations must go into virtual storage for next year, thanks for the reminder - it's definitely on our to do list :)
